main event: A UFO sighting reported on April 29, 1967, in Hartsdale, New York, observed as a very large star.
interesting points: The object was visible for four to five minutes., The observers described the movement as southwest to north northwest., The estimated elevation of the object was approximately 90Â°., The conditions were clear with a fairly bright moon., The sighting involved approximately 5 witnesses of varying ages including teenagers.
sighted object: UFO resembling a very large star
witness description: various ages including 1 at 15 years old and 2 at 13 years old
